titles.title: A bill to suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on certain internally lighted ceramic and porcelain miniatures of cottages, houses, churches, and other buildings and associated accessories and figurines.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1612)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on internally lighted ornamental porcelain and ceramic miniatures of buildings, including, but not limited to, cottages, houses, and churches and associated accessories and figurines specially designed primarily for display during the Christmas holiday season.
